content: *this long elegant motif scarf has a variety of magnificent granny squares similar to our knitting road scarf it can be made in small pieces and used for experimental designs as you may fancy lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 20331 corrections applied oct 22 2005 skill level intermediate size one size 102 inches x 7 inches including fringe microspun article #910 3 colors 2 balls each *shown in french vanilla mocha ebony* crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm special stitches beginning popcorn popcorn cluster puff triple triple crochet make 2-3 squares each of 20 different motifs whip stitch motifs together as shown in assembly diagram 2 motifs per row work crochet edging add fringe to finish
